alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:18PM CDT until June 15 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PHELPS...GOSPER AND SOUTHEASTERN DAWSON COUNTIES... At 1117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elwood, or 17 miles south of Lexington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Smithfield around 1125 PM CDT. Bertrand around 1130 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 236 and 253. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
